mapper.select: SELECT klass_seminar.id as klassSeminarId, report_ddl, seminar_status, klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial, seminar.id as seminarId, seminar_name as seminarName, attendance.id as attendanceId FROM klass_seminar, klass, seminar, attendance WHERE klass_seminar.klass_id = #{klassId} and klass_seminar.seminar_id = #{seminarId} and klass.id = #{klassId} and seminar.id = #{seminarId} and attendance.klass_seminar_id = klass_seminar.id

SELECT klass_seminar.id as klassSeminarId, report_ddl, seminar_status, klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial, seminar.id as seminarId, seminar_name as seminarName FROM klass_seminar, klass, seminar WHERE klass_seminar.seminar_id = #{seminarId} AND klass_seminar.klass_id = klass.id and seminar.id = #{seminarId}

SELECT klass_seminar.id as klassSeminarId, report_ddl, seminar_status, klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial, seminar.id as seminarId, seminar_name as seminarName FROM klass_seminar, klass_student, klass, seminar WHERE klass_student.student_id = #{studentId} AND klass_seminar.seminar_id = #{seminarId} AND klass_seminar.klass_id = klass_student.klass_id and seminar.id = #{seminarId}

SELECT klass_seminar.id as klassSeminarId, report_ddl, seminar_status, klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial, seminar.id as seminarId, seminar_name as seminarName FROM klass_seminar, klass, seminar, course WHERE course.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and klass.course_id = course.id and klass_seminar.klass_id = klass.id and (klass_seminar.seminar_status = 1 or 3) and seminar.id = klass_seminar.seminar_id
